name: Remember Every Word
description:
REMEMBER EVERY WORD It's a life-changing VR experience made in a few days for the Metaverse Creators Hackathon 2023.

You can watch the attached video but this way you will lose the chance to impact your future.

Dive into the state-of-the-art human experience.

Please play it only once, as it is a one-in-a-lifetime experience. 

There are many endings, but only one should be yours.

Living it is the only way.

Embark on an outstanding visual journey with your grip (grab) and trigger (fire). By selecting and firing up the word that contrasts with the rest, you can move the story forward and even control its narrative.

And remember "Remember Every Word" is just an experience. It lasts 5 minutes. The ending will blow your mind if you remembered the words ;)

Did you make a conscious decision?

The experience created in Unity, using Unity XR Interaction Toolkit 2.2.0

Voice effect created in voice.ai,

Developed on Oculus Quest 2 with AirLink on Windows 10,

Free Unity Asset Store Assets
